q1: How does the diff checker work?
a1: Paste your original and modified text in the two input areas. The tool uses a Longest Common Subsequence (LCS) algorithm to find and highlight all differences.
a2: Yes! The diff checker works with any text including source code, configuration files, and documents. It preserves formatting and uses monospace font for code.
a3: The tool runs entirely in your browser, so there is no upload limit. However very large texts (100K+ lines) may be slow.
